Chasis:

Center of Mass is 0.145130 -0.064736 0.530424

Inertia Tensor is :
| 2.100992 -0.039838 -0.545521 |
| -0.039838 7.561971 -0.001995 |
| -0.545521 -0.001995 8.238795 |

Initial Inertia Values:
Divide XX, YY, and ZZ by the Mesh Volume:
2.100992 / 6.220834 = 0.337734779613152
7.561971 / 6.220834 = 1.215587974216962
8.238795 / 6.220834 = 1.324387533890150
